questions.questionEn: Who was the first Prime Minister of India?
questions.questionHi: भारत के पहले प्रधानमंत्री कौन थे?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Jawaharlal Nehru was the first Prime Minister of India from 1947 to 1964.

questions.questionEn: Which is the largest state in India by area?
questions.questionHi: क्षेत्रफल के अनुसार भारत का सबसे बड़ा राज्य कौन सा है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Rajasthan is the largest state in India by area with 342,239 square kilometers.

questions.questionEn: What is the chemical symbol for Gold?
questions.questionHi: सोने का रासायनिक प्रतीक क्या है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The chemical symbol for Gold is Au (from Latin 'aurum').
